com.samsung.android.sdk.health.content

Class ShealthContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.health.content.ShealthContentManager

  • public class ShealthContentManager
extends Object
    This class provides the health service data management functionality.

      static interface  ShealthContentManager.SynchronizationListener

      • startSynchronization

        public void startSynchronization(int dataSyncType,
                        ShealthContentManager.SynchronizationListener listener)
                          throws RemoteException,
                                 IllegalStateException
        Start the data synchronization with a PHR server.
        Parameters:
        dataSyncType - The type of data to synchronize.
        listener - The listener interface to receive the synchronization result.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Thrown if the synchronization fail.
        IllegalStateException

                         throws RemoteException
